mapper.insert: insert t_review(t_customer_seq, review_title, review_content, review_grade, t_reservation_seq) values(#{customer_seq},#{review_title},#{review_content},#{review_grade},#{reservation_seq})
mapper.select: select * from t_review join t_reservation on t_reservation.reservation_seq = t_review.t_reservation_seq join t_goods_detail on t_goods_detail.goods_detail_seq = t_reservation.t_goods_detail_seq join t_goods on t_goods.goods_seq = t_goods_detail.t_goods_seq join t_company on t_goods.t_company_seq = t_company.company_seq where t_goods.goods_nm like concat("%",#{goods_nm},"%") and t_company.company_nm like concat("%",#{company_nm},"%")

select * from t_review join t_reservation on t_reservation.reservation_seq = t_review.t_reservation_seq join t_goods_detail on t_goods_detail.goods_detail_seq = t_reservation.t_goods_detail_seq join t_goods on t_goods.goods_seq = t_goods_detail.t_goods_seq join t_company on t_goods.t_company_seq = t_company.company_seq where t_review.review_seq = #{review_seq}
